data.title: HTML Boilerplate
data.comment: Basic structure of an HTML document including doctype, head, and body tags.

data.title: CSS Selectors
data.comment: Selectors help target specific HTML elements to apply styles.

data.title: Flexbox Layout
data.comment: Flexbox allows responsive alignment and distribution of items in a container.

data.title: Event Listeners
data.comment: Used to handle user interactions like clicks, mouse movements, and key presses.

data.title: Semantic Tags
data.comment: Tags like <article>, <section>, and <nav> improve accessibility and SEO.

data.title: Box Model
data.comment: Describes the layout of elements including margin, border, padding, and content.

data.title: DOM Manipulation
data.comment: Allows dynamic changes to HTML and CSS using JavaScript.

data.title: Forms and Inputs
data.comment: Used to collect user data with elements like input, textarea, and select.

data.title: Positioning
data.comment: Controls how elements are placed using static, relative, absolute, and fixed.

data.title: Loops
data.comment: Used to repeat code blocks using for, while, and do-while loops.

data.title: Tables
data.comment: Used to display tabular data using <table>, <tr>, <td>, and <th>.

data.title: Transitions
data.comment: Smoothly animates changes in CSS properties over time.

data.title: Functions
data.comment: Reusable blocks of code that perform specific tasks.

data.title: Media Queries
data.comment: Enable responsive design by applying styles based on screen size.

data.title: Forms Validation
data.comment: Ensures user inputs meet required criteria before submission.

data.title: Lists
data.comment: Organize content using ordered, unordered, and description lists.

data.title: Grid Layout
data.comment: Provides a two-dimensional layout system for complex designs.

data.title: Variables
data.comment: Used to store data values using var, let, and const.

data.title: Forms Styling
data.comment: Customize the appearance of form elements for better UX.

data.title: Conditional Statements
data.comment: Control flow using if, else, and switch statements.

data.title: React Components
data.comment: Understanding functional and class components.

data.title: React State Management
data.comment: Using useState and useReducer for local state.

data.title: React Lifecycle
data.comment: Exploring useEffect and component lifecycle hooks.

data.title: Node.js Modules
data.comment: Working with built-in and custom modules.

data.title: Node.js File System
data.comment: Reading and writing files using fs module.

data.title: Express Routing
data.comment: Defining routes and handling requests.

data.title: Express Middleware
data.comment: Creating and using middleware functions.

data.title: MongoDB CRUD
data.comment: Performing create, read, update, delete operations.

data.title: MongoDB Aggregation
data.comment: Using aggregation pipelines for data analysis.

data.title: Mongoose Models
data.comment: Defining schemas and models with Mongoose.

recentUploads.title: Semantic Elements
recentUploads.comment: Semantic elements like <article> and <section> help define the meaning of content, improving accessibility and SEO.

recentUploads.title: CSS Flexbox
recentUploads.comment: Flexbox is a layout model that allows responsive alignment and distribution of items within a container.

recentUploads.title: Event Handling
recentUploads.comment: Event handling lets us respond to user interactions like clicks, keypresses, and mouse movements.

recentUploads.title: Forms and Inputs
recentUploads.comment: Forms collect user data using input fields, checkboxes, radio buttons, and submit actions.

recentUploads.title: CSS Transitions
recentUploads.comment: Transitions animate changes in CSS properties smoothly over a defined duration.

recentUploads.title: Loops in JavaScript
recentUploads.comment: Loops like for, while, and do-while allow repeated execution of code blocks based on conditions.

recentUploads.title: HTML Tables
recentUploads.comment: Tables organize data in rows and columns using <table>, <tr>, <td>, and <th> tags.

recentUploads.title: CSS Media Queries
recentUploads.comment: Media queries apply styles conditionally based on screen size, resolution, or device type.

recentUploads.title: Functions
recentUploads.comment: Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform specific tasks and improve modularity.

recentUploads.title: CSS Box Model
recentUploads.comment: The box model defines how elements are spaced and sized using margin, border, padding, and content.
